cause.description:
World Bible School was established in 1973 to provide free Bible study courses to students around the world by postal, email or the web. Now WBS has students every country and territory around the world. Over 2 million students are studying WBS courses at any given time. WBS also provides a Bible study helper, a Christian friend, to help each student grow in faith and relationship with God.
WBS is a 501C3 nonprofit organization funded by gifts and donations of people who support the mission and the cause.
1. Everyone should have an opportunity to hear the Good News of Jesus Christ.
2. Christ died and was resurrected by God as Lord and Savior.
3. God promises if we seek Him, He will be found.
cause.mission: Our mission is to provide free Bible correspondence courses to people around the world. Helping people change their lives, helps people change the world.
cause.name: World Bible School
